data.title: Timezone: Europe
data.meta_description: Get information about the Europe/Paris time zone to gain key insights into the current time, DST, and standard time details. + Ready-made code for developers.
data.text:
date_default_timezone_set('Europe/Paris'); $timezone = new DateTimeZone('Europe/Paris'); $date = new DateTime('now', $timezone); echo $date->format('Y-m-d H:i:s');

from datetime import datetime import pytz tz = pytz.timezone("Europe/Paris") time_now = datetime.now(tz) current_time = time_now.strftime("%H:%M:%S") print("The current time:", current_time)
